briefdescription.para: Defining __DTS_C_API allows access to C API from inside a C++ file.

detaileddescription.para: dtsgui.h will only include the definitions for the C API using C++ if this is defined.

briefdescription.para: Wrapper functions exported to C to allow interfacing with C++.

detaileddescription.para:
DTS_C_API
__DTS_C_API
Distrotech GUI Library C API These functions should not be used in C++ applications.
